snippet.title: Olympic Games Tokyo 2020: The Official Video Game | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Go for gold in Olympic Games Tokyo 2020: The Official Video Game™, launching on all platforms on June 22, 2021!

Build your dream Olympian and compete across 18 fun-fueled events with friends & family as Olympic fever heats up this summer!

For more information, visit the official website for details: https://www.olympicvideogames.com/tokyo2020
